subject: Memorabilia and Souvenirs
Baseball
Collectors and Collections
Auctions
lead_paragraph: The uniform Bill Mazeroski wore when he hit the winning home run in the 1960 World Series sold for $632,500 at an auction.
snippet: The uniform Bill Mazeroski wore when he hit the winning home run in the 1960 World Series sold for $632,500 at an auction.
